product_name: BIC Sport SUP Deck Attachment Kit
long_description: The BIC Sport SUP Deck Attachment Kit lets you mount bungee rigging to the deck of your paddleboard for additional storage. Do-it-yourself kit requires no tools or drilling. Includes 4 EZ plugs, super glue adhesive, elastic bungee cord and user manual. The BIC Sport SUP Deck Attachment Kit is also a great choice for surfboards, canoes, kayaks and other watercraft.
short_description: The BIC Sport SUP Deck Attachment Kit lets you mount bungee rigging to the deck of your paddleboard for additional storage.
